org.waarp.common.database.model

Class DbModelAbstract

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.common.database.model.DbModelAbstract
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DbModel
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DbModelCommonMariadbMySql, DbModelH2, DbModelOracle, DbModelPostgresql

    public abstract class DbModelAbstract
extends Object
implements DbModel
    This Abstract class regroups common methods for all implementation classes.
